name: Fruits Pair Festival January
description:
All T&M's fruits pairs have gathered!!
Let's fight for good harvest!!

Nacchan, Nanachan, and Miss.Orange appear!!
The girl characters are being so active.
The boy characters may be a little strange??

Fight in pairs.
Fight on the highlands of the TREE in heavy snow falling.

All characters have four Fruits attacks and one Festival attack.
Solo play, BlueTooth VS play, Watch mode that computers fight with each other.

Yuki and Suno also appear.
They are not fruits, though...
